amendment.description: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part B of House Report 115-39 to prevent former political appointees at the VA from receiving non-political, competitively selected positions at the VA without having to go through the proper selection process.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Buck amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Buck.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Buck amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
